text: nivu avarige (devadutarige) neravagadiddare, (nimage tilidirali,) dhikkarigalu avarannu (nadininda) horahakidaga allahanu avarige neravagiruvanu. (Andu) avaru (dutaru) ibbaralli eradaneyavaragiddaru. Avaribbaru guheyalliddaga, avaru (dutaru) tam'ma sangatiyodane, ‘‘anjabeda, khanditavagiyu allahanu nam'ma jotegiddane.’’Endiddaru. Konege allahanu avarige manahsantiyannu ilisikottanu mattu nimage kanisada padegala mulaka avarige bala odagisidanu. Allade avanu dhikkarigala matannu solisidanu, allahana mate melayitu. Allahanu prabalanu yuktivantanu agiddane
